direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods validate Brazilian identification numbers (CPF and CNPJ) using similar algorithms and exception handling.
The cpf method generates CPF numbers and relies on the isCPFValid method to ensure the generated CPF matches the expected validity.
The cnpj method generates CNPJ numbers and relies on the isCNPJValid method, which shares similar validation logic with isCPFValid.
Both isCPFValid and isCNPJValid methods use the unmask method to remove formatting from the input strings before validation.
Both isCPFValid and isCNPJValid methods use the calculateWeight method to compute the weighted sum required for validation.
Both isCPFValid and isCNPJValid methods use the digit method to calculate the verification digit, which is a critical part of the validation process.
